title: Create three prominent blue rectangular buttons

requirements.summary: Transform the three action controls at the bottom of the screen into prominent rectangular buttons with solid blue backgrounds
acceptanceCriteria: Three separate rectangular buttons are visible at the bottom of the screen
Each button has a solid blue background fill
Buttons are clearly distinguishable as clickable rectangular elements
All three buttons use consistent styling and dimensions

file_operations.description: Replace the three action button elements with new rectangular button components featuring solid blue backgrounds. Update the button container styling to display three distinct rectangular buttons with consistent dimensions and spacing.

Add or update CSS classes for the three rectangular blue buttons. Define solid blue background color, proper padding, border-radius for rectangular shape, consistent width/height dimensions, and hover states for all three buttons.

requirements.summary: The first button displays a microphone icon with 'Enregistrer mes notes' text in black or gray on the blue background
acceptanceCriteria: Microphone icon is visible inside the first blue button
Text 'Enregistrer mes notes' appears in the button in black or gray
Icon and text are properly aligned within the button

file_operations.description: Update the first action button to include a microphone icon and the text 'Enregistrer mes notes'. Apply black or gray text color styling and ensure proper horizontal alignment of icon and text within the blue rectangular button.

requirements.summary: The second button displays a paper/document icon with 'Voir mes notes' text in black or gray on the blue background
